 Hey there, 
 BFCM week (week of Nov. 24) is less than three weeks away. Consider these tips, based on our customers’ 2024 BFCM email marketing results. 
 - Start your campaign on Monday or Tuesday, as shoppers often spend more per order earlier in the week. Definitely send an email on Wednesday. 
- Send on Black Friday and Cyber Monday — they’re table stakes. 
- Ensure welcome and abandoned checkout emails are activated. They generated higher conversion rates and average order values than BFCM newsletters.
